articles.title: Scientists just debunked the calcium and dementia myth
articles.description: A long-term Australian study found that calcium supplements do not raise dementia risk in older women, countering previous fears. articles.title: Scientists finally read the hidden DNA code that shapes disease
articles.description: EMBL researchers created SDR-seq, a next-generation tool that decodes both DNA and RNA from the same cell.
